name: 100 gecs
description: '''100 gecs''' ({{IPAc-en|ˈ|w|ʌ|n|_|ˈ|h|ʌ|n|d|r|ə|d|_|ˈ|ɡ|ɛ|k|s}}) is an American musical duo formed in 2015 that consists of [[Dylan Brady]] and [[Laura Les]]. They self-released their debut [[studio album|album]], ''[[1000 gecs]]'', in 2019 to positive reviews, followed by a companion remix album, ''[[1000 gecs and the Tree of Clues]]'', in 2020. They released their second studio album, ''[[10,000 gecs]]'', in 2023. Their music has been noted for its often chaotic yet catchy mixture of various styles, and has been described as helping to define the [[hyperpop]] genre.
